creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: Bacchus riding in low chariot pulled by centaurs and led by Satyrs playing instruments; an attendant to R of chariot holds a large bowl overflowing with grapevines, a soldier pushes the chariot from behind; a figure at rear wears blowing cape
marks: Signature monogram in plate, bottom center: [GP]
title: Triumph of Bacchus
